channel.title: Problem with client
channel.description:
so in login menu i deleted the
Ip address: and the Port: but then i changed all 127.0.0.1 for my ip address. i put on my flash drive took to another comp and it didn't work. what do i have to do?

item.title: Problem with client
item.dc:creator: @java_jamie java jamie
item.description:
@java_jamie wrote:

oh thats easy, just go into ur Client.java (client side) and serch for method19 and replace the hole method with this

public final Socket method19(int i) throws IOException { return new Socket(InetAddress.getByName("127.0.0.1"), i); //client IP }

Read full topic
